name: bull-1.svg
aboutme: "Citizens should never know what business we have with the virtual world of Ether. Puddle Hog, go to talk to Chloe Finally, the influencer, and get rid of everything without anyone knowing." Being the governor of this city involves making tough decisions.

skills.name: basic Atack
skills.description: Golpea al enemigo

skills.name: Takes life to all enemies
skills.description: Realiza un ataque de 100 de daño verdadero a todos los enemigos

skills.name: Up strench and energy
skills.description: Aumenta la energia y la fuera en un 20%

skills.name: Kamikaze boom
skills.description: Se suicida y su daño se reparte entre todos los enemigos

change.name: change
change.description: Intercambia tu carta del tablero por otra del banquillo

name: sheep-3.svg
aboutme: They call us "virtuals" because we spend many hours hooked on the world of Ether. The truth is that I don't care exactly what they call us. I just know that I enjoy doing what I want all day, and we get by on with what we are given.

aboutme: I make them happier, as I share my adventures here and there. Entering Ether is like coming to my paradise. You join?

name: dog-5.svg
aboutme: Life is like boxing. He who falls does not lose, but he who does not get up. This is how I encourage my students. We train very hard cause we know there is no shortcut to perfection.

skills.name: Refresh
skills.description: basic atack

skills.name: super
skills.description: Si mi carta muere, la del rival tambien, da igual su vida o escudo

skills.name: super
skills.description: Durante 4 turnos causa confusion al rival (50% de probabilidad de atacar cualquier carta del oponente)

skills.name: super
skills.description: Te pones un escudo del 20% de tu vida e inflinges daño al rival equivalente a un 30% de l escudo

name: pig-3.svg
aboutme: The governor has made it clear to me. If anyone finds out that we use the world of Ether to manage public opinion, we are finished. Chloe Finally just got home, and we're going to clear up this matter. She is very attractive and I would definitely spend the night with her.

skills.name: Max Geyser
skills.description: basic atack

skills.name: super
skills.description: No puede atacar hasta que cambie de carta, si solo tiene 1 carta, solo dura un turno

skills.name: super
skills.description: Duerme al enemigo, no puede hacer ninguna accion hasta que despierte, tiene un 55% probabilidad de que despierte al inició de cada turno

skills.name: super
skills.description: Durante 2 turnos el rival tiene un 50% de probabilidad de que falle sus habilidades

aboutme: Something is going wrong here. An influencer from the virtual world of Ether has been murdered in the apartment of a politician. Offensive messages to them, and few hints ... This case will be a strugle for me, but I will solve it.
